sim: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
sound_c:
- 32-bit/384kHz audio
  - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
  - Type-C to 3.5 mm headphone jack adapter
wlan: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, DLNA, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot
messaging: SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email
features_c:
- Fast battery charging 4.5V/5A (58% in 30 min)
  - DivX/XviD/MP4/H.265/WMV player
  - MP3/eAAC+/WMA/WAV/FLAC player
  - Document editor
  - Photo/video editor
colors: Midnight Blue, Titanium Gray, Mocha Brown, Pink Gold
sensors: Fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass
internal: 128 GB, 6 GB RAM or 64 GB, 4 GB RAM
body_c:
- IP67 certified - dust and water resistant
  - Water resistant up to 1 meter and 30 minutes
primary_: Dual: 12 MP (f/1.6, 27mm, OIS) +20 MP (f/1.6, 27mm), 2x lossless zoom, Leica optics, phase detection & laser autofocus, dual-LED dual-tone flash, check quality
features: Geo-tagging, touch focus, face/smile detection, panorama, HDR
